verbs.description: BEIJING ( AP ) - [ARG1: Asian stocks] [V: tumbled] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after U.S. President Donald Trump escalated a dispute with Beijing over technology policy by threatening a tariff hike on additional Chinese goods] .

BEIJING ( AP ) - Asian stocks tumbled Tuesday after [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: escalated] [ARG1: a dispute with Beijing over technology policy] [ARGM-MNR: by threatening a tariff hike on additional Chinese goods] .
